response.overview: "Truck" is what locals call an ordinary guy with extraordinary physical abilities. His name is Alexander, and he is 36 years old. In early childhood, constant family scandals, quarrels, and lack of attention led to irreversible consequences. Due to his weak development, Alexander was not immediately accepted into school, and his self-formed character did not lend itself to education, so the problems only grew. Despite this, Alexander managed to cultivate diligence, neatness, and extraordinary strength in himself. While attending school, the hero of the film leaves home in search of an independent life and work, where his childhood dream of becoming a truck driver comes true, only instead of an engine, his living heart beats.
response.title: The Truck

results.name: "The Truck" Official trailer. ENG CC. Due to the war in Ukraine, the film will be released in 2025
